text: Ryanair Flight 4978 was an international scheduled passenger flight from Athens International Airport, Greece, to Vilnius Airport, Lithuania. On 23 May 2021, explosives were falsely reported on board the aircraft as it neared Lithuanian airspace. The aircraft was forced to land by a Belarusian fighter jet when it was over Belarusian airspace. It landed at Minsk National Airport, on the orders of Belarusian President Alexander Lukashenko. Once the aircraft was on the ground, two of its passengers, opposition activist and journalist Roman Protasevich and his girlfriend Sofia Sapega were arrested. On August 9, 2021, head of the Minsk National Airport Vyacheslav Khoroneko was put in the of the USA. He got a punishment as a person who made it possible to land the flight there. ==References== Category:2021 disasters in Europe Category:Athens Category:2020s in Belarus Category:2020s in Greece Category:2020s in Lithuania Category:International relations Category:May 2021 events Category:Minsk Category:Aviation accidents and incidents in 2021 Category:Aviation accidents and incidents in Europe
title: Ryanair Flight 4978
